poetic_corpus.poem:
I <tag class='VBP'>am</tag> the Rock, <tag class='JJ'>presumptuous</tag> Sea! I <tag class='VBP'>am</tag> set to <tag class='VB'>encounter</tag> thee. Angry and loud, or <tag class='VB'>gentle</tag> and <tag class='RB'>still</tag>, I <tag class='VBP'>am</tag> set <tag class='RB'>here</tag> to <tag class='VB'>limit</tag> <tag class='JJ'>thy</tag> <tag class='NN'>power</tag>, and I will I <tag class='VBP'>am</tag> the Rock !
I <tag class='VBP'>am</tag> the Rock. From <tag class='NN'>age</tag> to <tag class='NN'>age</tag> I <tag class='VBP'>scorn</tag> <tag class='JJ'>thy</tag> <tag class='NN'>fury</tag> and <tag class='NN'>dare</tag> <tag class='NN'>thy</tag> rage. Scarred by <tag class='NN'>frost</tag> and <tag class='NN'>worn</tag> by <tag class='NN'>time</tag>, Brown with <tag class='NN'>weed</tag> and <tag class='JJ'>green</tag> with <tag class='JJ'>slime</tag>, Thou may'st <tag class='NN'>drench</tag> and <tag class='JJ'>defile</tag> <tag class='NN'>me</tag> and <tag class='NN'>spit</tag>
in my <tag class='NN'>face</tag>,
But while I <tag class='VBP'>am</tag> <tag class='RB'>here</tag> thou <tag class='JJ'>keep'st</tag> <tag class='JJ'>thy</tag> <tag class='NN'>place</tag>! I <tag class='VBP'>am</tag> the Rock!
I <tag class='VBP'>am</tag> the Rock, beguiling Sea!
I <tag class='VBP'>know</tag> thou <tag class='NN'>art</tag> <tag class='NN'>fair</tag> as <tag class='JJ'>fair</tag> <tag class='NN'>can</tag> <tag class='VB'>be</tag>,
With <tag class='JJ'>golden</tag> <tag class='NN'>glitter</tag> and <tag class='NN'>silver</tag> sheen
And <tag class='NN'>bosom</tag> of <tag class='JJ'>blue</tag> and <tag class='NNS'>garments</tag> of <tag class='JJ'>green</tag>.
